name: imbo/imbo
description: RESTful image server that handles image storage/transformations and metadata

suggest.imbo/imbo-s3-adapters: Enables usage of AWS S3 for storing images
suggest.imbo/imbo-b2-adapters: Enables usage of Backblaze B2 for storing images
suggest.imbo/imbo-filesystem-adapters: Enables usage of a (local) filesystem for storing images
suggest.imbo/imbo-metadata-cache: Enables caching of metadata through an event listener
suggest.imbo/imbo-mysql-adapters: Enables usage of MySQL as database
suggest.imbo/imbo-mongodb-adapters: Enables usage of MongoDB for storing images
suggest.imbo/imbo-postgresql-adapters: Enables usage of PostgreSQL as database
suggest.imbo/imbo-sqlite-adapters: Enables usage of SQLite as database

scripts-descriptions.test:phpunit:coverage: Run unit tests using PHPUnit with code coverage enabled (requires Xdebug)
scripts-descriptions.test:behat:mongodb-gridfs: Run the MongoDB / GridFS Behat test suite
scripts-descriptions.test:behat:mongodb-filesystem: Run the MongoDB / Filesystem Behat test suite
scripts-descriptions.test:behat:sqlite-filesystem: Run the SQLite / Filesystem Behat test suite
scripts-descriptions.test:behat:mysql-filesystem: Run the MySQL / Filesystem Behat test suite
scripts-descriptions.test:behat:postgresql-filesystem: Run the PostgreSQL / Filesystem Behat test suite
scripts-descriptions.test: Run unit tests and all Behat test suites
scripts-descriptions.cs: Check coding standard against the official Imbo coding standard
